channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Voici le PC « parfait » pour Linux selon son créateur
item.description: Linus Sebastian (LTT) a enfin construit un PC pour Linus Torvalds, le père de Linux. Mais oubliez les LED RGB et les boucles de watercooling complexes. La machine du créateur de Git est une leçon de pragmatisme brut qui risque de vexer pas mal de "gamers".

item.title: Astronomers Have Found 6,000 Exoplanets—but This Could Be the First Known Exomoon
item.description: After decades of searching, astronomers may have finally stumbled upon the first moon known to exist beyond our solar system—and it's an absolute giant.

item.title: Netflix Won't Let You Cast Shows From Your Phone to Your TV Anymore
item.description: The streaming giant quietly removed the feature that lets you control content on your TV screen using a mobile device. The company says the feature was not widely used.

item.title: The still-great AirPods Pro 2 are $85 cheaper than the latest model for Cyber Monday
item.description: Tim Cook, please stop telling me that the AirPods Pro 3 are Apple’s most advanced earbuds yet, and that I’m gonna love them. I know they have a built-in heart rate tracker, improved bass performance, and that they include a set of extra small silicone ear tips — totaling a whopping five sizing options in […]

item.title: Most teenagers dislike today’s news media and journalists
item.description: When asked for one word to describe today’s news media, 84% of teens surveyed responded with something negative. Cat Murphy, a college student, has wanted to be a journalist since she was 11. Many of her friends don’t understand why.

item.title: MKBHD is taking down his wallpaper app
item.description: Marques Brownlee’s Panels wallpaper app is shutting down on December 31st, barely a year after its controversial launch. “We made mistakes making our first app, and ultimately, we weren’t able to turn it into the vision I had,” Brownlee said in a video on the MKBHD YouTube channel. The Panels launch in September 2024 was […]

item.title: Why Don’t Norwegians Hate Tesla Like the Rest of Europe Does?
item.description: November’s Tesla registrations were down in France, Sweden, Denmark, and Germany. Norway, however, is bucking the trend—thanks to a tax incentive system that will soon be rolled back.

item.title: Housing market delistings just hit a decade high—raising one big question
item.description: Looking ahead, the outstanding question is how many of these delistings will return to the housing market in spring 2026. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.
